-JpmVOtodUBju8cPlv6A.instructions: After completing each step of this tutorial, click the blue "Done" button in the instructions bar (at the top of the screen). Try it now!

-JpmVRUr5__RUpGbLO5t.instructions: Type "buy milk" in the input field, and press Enter to add a new todo item.

-JpmVTvVcdVl5wZy_uXq.instructions: Type "buy milk" in the input field, and press Enter to add a new todo item.

-JpmVUjkbP7bPL3_jVKN.instructions: Double-click on the todo item you added to show the details panel on the right.

-JpmVXGMLeOz5hHtK1qr.instructions: Write a more detailed description in the yellow area on the right: "for the cake"

-JpmVbGNX-ZWTbnDsci5.instructions: Click on the star icon to mark it as important.

-JpmVcgsE21VA6r3UZnZ.instructions: Click on the star icon to mark it as important.

-JpmVh06aYJNwYH0DeEd.instructions: In the left sidebar, there is an item called "Starred". This is an intelligent filter, that shows all the todos due in the coming week. Check that "call mom" appears there.

-JpmVk6UewA2a1TCc1SV.instructions: To create another todo, you need to go back to the Inbox. Click on "Inbox" in the left sidebar.

-JpmVnpjLVph_UvgS7tK.instructions: Add a third todo item: "watch a good movie"

-JpmVpY6yeFEunjxR27i.instructions: Add a third todo item: "watch a good movie"

-JpmW4t3s9wf1ESm86lA.instructions: Double-click on this todo item, and change its due date to next Saturday.

-JpmW6833WWCTih3xWmy.instructions: Let's say you have bought the milk. Tick the checkbox to mark the corresponding todo item as complete.

-JpmW7Lt3zm-bpHbxYJI.instructions: Let's say you have bought the milk. Tick the checkbox to mark the corresponding todo item as complete.

-JpmW9CFtbyTsuAvhBfd.instructions: At the bottom of the list, there is a button "1 completed item". Click on it to reveal the todo you've just checked off.

-JpmWBIlfpd9bGwxeU2d.instructions: Delete the todo item "buy milk": double-click on it to open the details panel, then click the trash icon at the bottom.

-JpmWF6N-4sU0rU2kCqt.instructions: To change the settings, click on "Ann Onymous ▼" in the top left corner, and choose "Customize" in the menu.

-JpmWJ_GH0UX912yyEQ3.instructions: You are now in Customization Mode. You can click on the highlighted items to see the settings associated with them.
